name: Parent
description:
Jump straight into the mystery as 10 year old sisters, Mina and Nina, return home to find their mother missing. Follow clues and uncover secrets on the quest to discover the truth! One thing is for certain; there appears to be supernatural forces at hand here...

This game may require an "RPG VX RTP" or "RGSS202E.dll". The following links are provided:

RTP package: https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/downloads (Go to "Run Time Package"> Select "RPG Maker VX" > Press "Download Run Time Package")

.dll package: https://www.dll-files.com/rgss202e.dll.html
